meanings.definition: One of the parts of a mixture or recipe.
meanings.sent1: Flour is an important ingredient in baking cookies.
meanings.sent2: The secret ingredient in her famous soup is love.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf swapped the sugar with salt, creating a disastrous ingredient mix-up.
meanings.sent4: Laughter is the key ingredient to a happy life.
meanings.sent5: Without water, the dough lacked a crucial ingredient for its success.

meanings.definition: A component or element of something.
meanings.sent1: Trust is a vital ingredient in any relationship.
meanings.sent2: Hard work is the main ingredient for success.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected ingredient of humor made the serious meeting more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: Patience is the secret ingredient to achieving your goals.
meanings.sent5: Kindness is an essential ingredient in creating a caring community.
